item.description: Three old and not so old ladies are meeting for an 11 a.m. movie matinee at the Lowes AMC Theater, The Loop, Methuen, MA, followed by lunch at a location TBD. The movie we will see is Clint Eastwood's new film "Trouble With the Curve". If you like movies and are free during the day, please join us.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Movie matinee and lunch at the Loop in Methuen, MA, Friday September 28
